website_summaries.verdict: This 0.01 resolution pH meter is accurate enough for lab work or for use at home.
pros: The straightforward design of this pH meter make it a good option for those new to pH meters, but its accuracy and reliability make it well equipped for lab use as well
Its three-point calibration gives it an accuracy of +/- 0.02 pH, which should suit the needs of most
This meter can also measure the temperature of substances
cons: Some customers found that it took several minutes to take a reading with this meter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ph meter for indoor hydroponics. Calibration was simple and straight forward. The meter was easy to use and seemed accurate and consistent. Much better than the cheap $10 meters. I ended up breaking the glass electrode 2 months after purchase... (the probe is nicely protected but i still managed to smack it against a hard surface) I emailed the manufacturer looking to purchase a replacement electrode. They answer quickly and said they can't supply a replacement part but would like to send me a brand new replacement meter, for free, no questions asked. (just needed the original order number) Now that is great customer service. I'll look into dr.meter for any future needs before i go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic meter
customer_reviews.text: Meter is very accurate, with easy to read display. Supplied with calibration solutions , enough for two calibrations. Extra battery’s. Tough storage case with cradle for meter. Meter calibration is simple and easy. The more this meter is used the faster it becomes at displaying the reading. It does however take some ( boringly) time to “settle” in to a reading if it’s not used often. Great meter case xtra batts xtra calibration solution. It’s really a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: Joj

customer_reviews.title: It shows different values of the same solution. After ...
customer_reviews.text: It shows different values of the same solution. After recalibration there is the same situation, several times measured the same solution and each time it showed different value of pH. Returned it and bought cheap one what does it job perfectly! p.s. I change my review with one star to four stars, because I was contacted by the customer support and offered another meter. I calibrated the meter twice. Now its reading close but still is not reliable. There is not definitely 0.01 accuracy! At the same time I cannot claim that another meter is high accuracy also. In general, I got the idea about my pH meters and will still looking for much more reliable meter.
customer_reviews.author: Aiva

customer_reviews.title: Product will not calibrate
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these products and returned them both. The product will calibrate to the 6.89 solution, but will not recognize the 4.0 or 9.18 solutions. I have a cheaper ph meter that read the same solutions correctly both times I tried to calibrate the new product. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a week don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second phase open I bought and failed, right out of the box it would not turn on and eventually I got it to light up. The first few days it worked good and was fairly accurate to other phntesting equipment and that was it back to being blank sometimes it might come on but don't count on it I would not buy this if I was you maybe a little bit better made one I guess.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Today I am very happy that I learned how to calibrate it and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have written to the support team as my PH-100 did not work at the beginning. Today I am very happy that I learned how to calibrate it and the machine works as expected. Besides that, I need to say that Dr. Meter customer service is simply THE BEST, such professionally trained personnel, in special Amy, what a great professional and person. Thank you dr. Meter for the great support and product. Thank Emily. Another happy customer Thank you LCL
customer_reviews.author: Luiz C. Laba

customer_reviews.title: Works, just what I needed, waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Using to mix hydroponic nutrients in water. Good value for features, comes with Ph reference powder but will need more, small sugar size packets (6) included. Batteries were added to package, was a little strange, but got some extra (4 batteries) in the package for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: MurseJeff

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This thing fell apart the second time I used it, and because the pins have to fit the tiny little holes to put it back together, I had to toss it. What a tremendous waste of money. update: This company has been emailing me for months offering money to take down my bad review. Seems like a shady business practice to me and I will not be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dahlbeck

customer_reviews.title: pH readings are not reproduceable on this meter
customer_reviews.text: For $35.00 I wasn't expecting much from this meter, but thought I would try it for my swimming pool. Unit calibrates as expected. But when checking known pH solutions or rechecking the cal. solutions, readings are always off by > 0.4 - 0.8. I would return, but I waited too long. Amazon has plenty of other meters in this price range to select from. After 3 months, this thing has only become worse. Now it will not even return a value that is within 1.5 units from known solutions, even right after calibration. Pass on this one, it's a waste of money, wish I had returned this right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, but difficult to calibrate.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help me grow hydroponically indoors. Beware, the instructions that are available online are easy to read and understand but they did not apply to the instrument that was sent to me. The enclosed instructions were clearly written by someone who does not understand English very well. If you keep trying, you'll get it. After that, it's very easy to use. One thing I don't like is that it takes a long time for the instrument to give the final PH value. If you don't need a precise reading, you could probably go with one that's cheaper and has only one set screw for calibration.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Reliable pH readings, LCD is not back-lit
customer_reviews.text: Well working pH meter - so far. The meter was easily calibrated. The directions are pretty good but I could not change the temperature readout to read Fahrenheit instead of the default centigrade. The LCD is not back-lit even though the ad says it is (see photo). If this one fails before its time, I'll be sure to revise my rating. I tried one of the $13 pH meters and it quit giving reliable readings within 3 days. After over 2 months of daily use this meter has been dependable and accurate. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Used once then stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I used this only once then it stopped working. I have had a bunch of PH meters over the years for an indoor hydroponics (DWC) setup. Maybe it’s just a fluke but I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with this meter
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing several cheaper (yellow) meters, I finally spent the money for this upgrade. Directions are slightly confusing for calibrating the meter, but I managed it fairly easy. Meter seems to be working well. Only issue is the fact that there are no directions for inserting batteries and it is possible to put them in backwards. I got lucky, and guessed right the first time. t's not back lit, so it can be hard to read, but it works! That's a definite plus after all the meters I've struggled with.
customer_reviews.author: michael n. yavorsky

customer_reviews.title: This PH meter might as well be not labeled waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these. The first failed by giving false readings, the second fell in my reservoir flashed the display and filled with water. If this product is waterproof why does water get under the plastic cover on the screen so easy? I am currently letting it dry, but that doesnt seem to promising. Would have been five stars if I had it for over a year. I use it maybe once a month to make sure my ph on my plants is still where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L.

customer_reviews.title: Won't calibrate! Waste my time.
customer_reviews.text: Really needed this thing to work being I have a coral reef aquarium, but could not get it to calibrate to the 4.00 solution. According to the barely understandable instructions the solution is bad or the electrode is bad. They included 2 packets of the solutions and neither would calibrate. I even used a friend's premixed 4.00 solution. Still nothing. Thanks for nothing but a major waste of time and effort and now I have to wait for my money back and the time it will take to get a different one . Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do your research.
customer_reviews.text: This pH meter is really not worth the money. I have had a hard time ever getting a clear reading from it. It just never stops going up or down it doesn’t stop on a single reading. I ordered it in 2019, wish I could get my money back for it but I’m sure that’s impossible by now. And calibrating it with the instructions doesn’t work either it will read the first to buffer solutions but will not read the 9.18 solution. Overall. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderJake

customer_reviews.title: They dont last.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well just takes it a min to stop drifting. After a while the numbers started jumping up and down and showing L and H thought the batteries were dead so I put new ones in it and re calibrated at least tried to now it will not cal. Just jumps all over the ph scale
customer_reviews.author: A a ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how easy this meter is to calibrate and use. I've always had a problem with chemical testing matching the color to the chart. However, with this meter, the reading is spot on every time. When I ran into a timing problem with it after eight months and asked if I could send it to them for repair. Instead, they sent a New Meter! Absolutely the best customer service I've experienced in many years! You certainly won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BLB

customer_reviews.title: Works good for 6 months..
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasted....which was exactly 6 months. When the order arrived it had dried calibration solution on the tip inside of the clear protective cap. Then I sent an email to customer service which was answered quickly. They offered a new one but the one I had calibrated correctly. Also, it checked against several references. I liked this meter and the service wasn’t bad. In the end though it isn’t worth the price. I held the memorial today. RIP DrMeter 2/12/19-6/30/19 I’m gonna miss you blue...
customer_reviews.author: WillyJayTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Working Great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to follow the instructions to calibrate the device. The meter came with two sets of batteries and two sets of calibration packets in the sturdy case for storage. It is definitely a good entry level pH meter, as I see one can spend much more for these devices, but the meter is doing great for checking the pH of mixed liquid nutrients in water for my plants.
customer_reviews.author: r v

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate but slow. And Fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is apparent throughout. great gasketed cap for the probe that keeps it wet. It takes about 20 seconds to settle on a number, a little disconcerting when in a hurry. Seems rugged. But, it's round design makes it roll wherever you put it down. Mine just rolled off my workbench to the ground and no longer responds. Not sure what I'll do. Want one that is stable, fast and accurate to a point. Waiting a full minute to wait for the devise to finish its reading one can get impatient when there are a dozen buckets to measure and balance.
customer_reviews.author: GDub

customer_reviews.title: Bought two defective units, got refunds.
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased two. Both highly defective. Beyond inaccurate. Not able to calibrate. Got a refund for both. Sellers customer service was top notch and expediant. This is a cheap version of the higher quality look-alike units available for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chappie

customer_reviews.title: It needs calibrated every two days to be correct.
customer_reviews.text: To be accurate it needs to be calibrated every couple days which is ridiculous in my opinion for the money you pay for it . Heck the little cheap $12-$15 ones are more accurate and stay calibrated longer . I have two of them I’ve done a test to see which of the three were most off and the one that is the most often . Even if you keep the sponge damp and the cap on and don’t ever let the little tester for the ph dry out it still never stays calibrated for more than two days ! It’s junk !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: Wrong reviews for ph meter
customer_reviews.text: Only had this ph meter for 2 weeks seems ok. My problem here is most of the reviews aren t even for the ph meter, I think that's deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Vitale

customer_reviews.title: High quality PH meter
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate once calibrated. Temperature reading on display is very helpful. With any PH meter, it's detrimental to keep the probe clean of contaminants by using distilled water before and after every use. Then gently dry with a clean towel. This meter has a clear cap that protects the probe when not in use. This is excellent as it also has an O-ring to hold the cap snugly in place. This also allows for a small amount of probe storage solution to be added in the cap so the probe stays in the solution while not in use. Excellent product. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Steve Grega

customer_reviews.title: Best meter I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of units that quickly go out of calibration and require constant changing of batteries. This unit costs a bit more than most, but it lasts longer and stays in calibration longer than all others. I wish I would have just gotten one of these from the start. It is so much better than loosing plants because you have inaccurate PH readings, and cheaper than constantly purchasing replacement batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yarger

customer_reviews.title: Dr Meter PH-100 - nice upgrade from the yellow pen
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to calibrate the device. Just follow the instructions, and the correct order of buffer solution (6,4,9). The package came with enough buffer solution packets to calibrate the device two times, and also included an extra set of watch batteries, which was a very nice bonus. The customer support was excellent at drmeter. Leslie helped me with a replacement (the first meter's probe had dried out) within 3 days! Would definitely order from them again since they were so fast to help fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable meter for home use
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at the accuracy of the pH meter compared to the expected pH value of the standards provided and that the standards all had temperature correction tables on their package to ensure accuracy of all readings. The calibration process is a little confusing at first, but can be done in only a few minutes after reading the instructions sufficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: The customer service.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I found no instructions and only one set of water crystals. I looked it up on YouTube and found instructions. I did complain to the company about being upset. In less than 24 hours the most friendly representative was in touch with me offering ways to make things right. Within 48 hours I received a replacement in the mail. Ms Qualla made things so simple for me. I'm extremely happy with my Dr. Meter.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia Williams

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are Chinglish garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to more or less get the PH right after calibrating, though the instructions are in such poor English that I'm not sure anyone can know whether they've done it right. Edit: I've received 5+ emails from the seller trying to get me to redact my review. Listen, I like the PH meter. It seems to do an okay job. But the instructions really do lower my rating of this product, and I am extraordinarily skeptical of any seller that tries to coerce buyers into changing their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Option for home wine making
customer_reviews.text: I previously had very inexpensive (Jellas) ph meter for home winemaking. That one had single point calibration with screwdriver required. In home winemaking i use to check wine PH which is usually PH 3 to 3.5, and Titration end point for Total Acidity, which is PH 8.2. I was re-calibrating prior PH meter for each reading - which is inconveient. This meter has three point calibration without screw driver and is very convenient to use. If you are only checking PH within a tight range the inexpensive PH meter would be a good option. Checking my prior Jellas with this new meter do get similar results, once callibrated near expected measurement range.
customer_reviews.author: George M Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Quick, reliable, accurate, simple... Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This pH meter is surprisingly impressive. I honestly wasn't expecting it to be nearly as high quality as it is. I tested it in a variety of solutions as I was tampering with the pH levels using acids and bases (eg: ascorbic acid, sodium bicarbonate, etc). I would test the solution with different types of pH indicator strips, then try to guess what result the pH meter would yield. I was within .5 literally every time, completely surprising. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, product is junk.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. We received one and the ph measurement broke the first day and did not give an accurate reading. Okay well stuff happens, no big deal, Amazon sent me a replacement free of charge. However after 2 months of moderate use it is broken again. Will not pursue replacement since it is an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: It won't give you the proper ph level!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comes with two sets of batteries and two sets of ph 6.86 4.0 and 9.86 powders in a nice plastic box. Cons: Hard to get it calibrated right. Once it's calibrated you can't recalibrate it even if you pull the batteries out. Mine quit working properly after one week. It won't tell you the proper ph level in the proper standard. Don't waste your money on this POS. It's going back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.  You're welcome.
customer_reviews.text: I received this and followed the calibration instructions. It gave an error type of message for 2 of the calibration powders. I opened up another calibration powder and remixed it in distilled water. Another error code was then seen. I calibrated successfully 1 out of the 3 packets. I am now returning this. Well at least I found this China made junk was junk before I used it in a real situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break- be careful
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use this- there are two parts that have screw openings and I unscrewed one looking to put the batteries in and it turned out if you unscrew that part (not where the batteries go) you can't get it back together easily AT ALL. It's impossible to line up the pins and mine bent and that was that. I am an idiot for not reading the directions thoroughly first, but WHY WHY WHY is that part even openable if you can't get it back together?! I didn't manhandle it at all and was very gently trying to get it back together but it was really impossible to do. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Saviers Dean

customer_reviews.title: Broken right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The unit would not caliber or function properly. I followed all the instructions and watched several youtube videos and still could not get it to read anything with stability. None of the functions such as CAL and Hold would not work. It was broken right out of the box. Do not buy this product. Spend a little more money and get something that actually works. One star is too many. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Maziar Tafreshinejad

customer_reviews.title: Customer service worth the extra expense
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed, have to calibrate EVERY use, off by .5 or more. I've had 12.00 meters that worked better. Update: 10/20/19 Without even being asked the company offered me a replacement because of my poor review. Just received new one and calibrated one time, seems to be accurate. Nice to have a company stand by its product.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Mize

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, easy to use and calibrate, saves me time in pH testing.
customer_reviews.text: I use similar meters at work to test pH in boiler water treatment. I purchased this one to more easily track the pH in my aquariums. I already had an understanding of what to expect from using this meter. I really like that it comes with the packets for calibration, it comes with an extra set as well. The accuracy is great, I haven’t had any issues with it since the initial calibration. I make sure to rinse it distilled water after each use and keep the sponge in the cap to retain moisture. If you follow the instructions I think it will provide you exactly what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The directions were easy yo follow and the meter is easy to read, but unfortunately for me my device was not very accurate. Sometimes up to 1 whole pH reading off from what it was supposed to be, and this was just while calibrating it. Hopefully mine is just defective and a new one will be better, but either the pH solutions are wrong or the meter is wrong, because it was reading the 4.00 pH as 3.1 which is much different. I use this to check the pH of my cosmetics so I just need something that is in the ballpark range, but if you need 0.01 accuracy this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: First pH Meter and happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: Important to note on the packaging: 1. I thought I got only 2x RED packet solutions, but actually there are 2x 3(RED, GREEN, BLUE) when you open it. 2. The electrode is shipped wet with a sponge in a solution (its not used) – this helps protect so it helps with readings, after contacting the seller. This is my first pH meter and have used it a couple times so far for measuring the pH of my wort when homebrewing and also measuring the pH of the coco-coir, hydroponic soil for my hop plants. Not difficult to calibrate and set up once you know what to do (mix the solutions with water in cups, hit the calibrate button, done).
customer_reviews.author: Henrik

customer_reviews.title: It’s Not Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Had I known how difficult this was going to be to use I’d of never bought it. The instructions are not great, and it is very tedious to get set to use. I’m using it to check the Ph of sour beer, so I would have preferred something that sets up more quickly. I will probably just throw this away and use test strips.
customer_reviews.author: Michael postiff

customer_reviews.title: Worked great when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased I January and it was working great. Now even after calibration had wildly inaccurate readings. I could not find a replacement probe for this meter. Now this is a paperweight sitting in my drawer now because any amazon support closed for the item. Guess I'm stuck with a $40 piece of plastic now.
customer_reviews.author: CO5280

customer_reviews.title: Calibration doesn’t hold
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s user error, but after reading other reviews and following the manual Calibration instructions I may have a bad device. I have banged it against an object a few times but not in a absolute alarming manner. It came moistened straight out of box, not in a powered/crystal covering like others have mentioned. Even after immediate calibration it has been about .15 off. It has been sitting in a drawer for a couple months until I finally used it but I don’t think that should of been an issue. I should of tested it before my return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my ph meter and was contacted by the seller how they were going to take care of the problem, I am very impressed by the customer service that is provided by the seller, the meter is of very high quality and very dependable but best of all is the customer service I highly recommend this seller and I will be a long time customer.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in October 2019. It was a replacement for a faulty unit that would not calibrate. I used it for a couple of months with no issues. Noticed my pH wasn’t reading right last week and tried to calibrate the unit. Would not calibrate, contacted the company to buy a replacement probe and they sent me a new unit free of charge. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just keep it dry.
customer_reviews.text: The PH meter is great, easy to read and accurate. I would give 5 stars but the meter looks like is missing an O ring or some type of water resistance treatment. If the meter passes the orange line at the water line the meter will measure wrong because the electronics inside the pen meter are wet. Open the meter and let it dry. The pen should work just fine when completely dry. Other than that is a great meter and I used almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Julianab

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.  Little slow on dialing in.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a small PH meter that you had to hold down a slide to keep it on. This PH meter has been fantastic. It corrects for temperature, the shape is better suited for testing, it's accurate to two decimal points. Overall a great device, my one small complaint is that it takes it's time to get to the actual PH. I recommend keeping an eye on the reading and making sure it stays steady for at least 15 seconds before taking your reading. The packaging also included a carrying case, two sets of PH calibration powder (I just bought some liquid instead, make sure to get the correct set for this), and two sets of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are jiberish
customer_reviews.text: Instructions lost every thing in translation. Never got it to calibrate. Wanted to check the Ph of my pond. Update: They sent me a new meter, Instructions are the same. Still don't make sense. English is a hard language to learn.
customer_reviews.author: mwa2597

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product.  It sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Calibrated this instrument as directed with hard-to-read instructions. Had to refer to a YouTube video to do it, as the instructions were rather vague and poorly written. Unit seemed to work okay during calibration. First time I used it a few days later, my distilled water kept measuring at 10.9 PH. Reverse osmosis water was about the same. Totally screwed up my project. Had to junk everything and abandon my project. Pissed me off!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wu Chung

customer_reviews.title: Please hire english speaking tech writers
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are written in English by someone who doesn't know the English language making it very difficult to calibrate. I used all the calibration packets (3) in one week just trying to figure out how to calibrate the thing, being discouraged by the part of the instructions that indicate if you mess up on the calibration you're reading will all be off! It might be a good PH meter but I am not sure as I still don't know if it's calibrated right. It should come with about 10 packets of calibrating powder to make up for lack of clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for the price. Clear instructions to keep the unit accurate for many years. Seems sturdy. Arrives in a plastic storage case with watch batteries included. The black and yellow throw away units loose their accuracy in a year and you can't replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Very good instrument, good price, poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, good precision pH meter that comes with calibration standards. It comes in a plastic case and appears to be of sturdy construction, although one must always treat the business end of pH meters with care. Mine has held calibration over periods of a couple weeks, which surprises me. I'm a geochemist (and homebrewer) who has used a lot of laboratory-grade pH meters over the years. This one is worth the price. However, the directions are a poor translation from Chinese to English. They are decipherable, but I'm glad that I already knew how to use a meter.
customer_reviews.author: E. James

customer_reviews.title: Good While It Lasted
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this pen when it first arrived. Extra batteries, calibration solution powder and a nice plastic storage case. It worked fine for about 5 weeks then the readings were all over the place. Then I noticed some condensation on the digital screen. I never submerged it, never dropped it and now it doesn't work at all. PH monitoring is the key to hydroponics. Spend the money and get the BlueLab PH Pen.
customer_reviews.author: Swaindawg33

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are reading this before buying looking for the right one, well this is, it is well worth every penny! Meter works great very fast, I have this one and a $300 meter I got years ago. This one works faster and is just as accurate. You do have to hold it to in water to wait for reading, but it takes seconds rather than minutes, well worth it. Also, had a problem with the meter (my fault) contacted them for help and they helped me immediately, AMAZING Company, wish I could give 10 stars, will definitely be getting another one of these if I ever need it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Keehner

customer_reviews.title: Nice meter
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulty calibrating initially, determined unit was faulty and a new one was sent despite being a prolinged period from purchasing. New unit appears to work well. Still a bit of a process to calibrate but not too bad. Controls are simple and easy to use. Accuracy hard to determine this early on but seems reasonable. I appreciated the help I got from the company resolving my issue with original unit.
customer_reviews.author: TIM V.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use horrible tech support.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design. I couldn’t get it to function in any usable way. Out of the box the ranges were all over the place and when I attempted to calibrate it malfunctioned. Contacted tech support and all they did was read from the instructions on how to calibrate. When I explained the calibration issues they said o well must be defective. Lol 10% off on your next meter. Why would I ever buy another one. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Diallyo Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good construction. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my use. Had cheaper model of another brand, did not last 6 months. This one is by far a better made product all around. So far, it is the best meter for the money of any that I have had. I give it 5 stars. In 6 months I will post another again.
customer_reviews.author: Roth3248

customer_reviews.title: top notch quality seriously look no more
customer_reviews.text: Best ph meter so far I haven’t used the almighty ( blue lab ph pen ) but my Chinese one worked great for a year up until I got it wet I ordered this dr meter it was so easy to calibrate and it’s a charm to use I love this thing and it comes in a very nice sturdy package so when shipped thought I’d have to worry bout it getting screwed up but when I came in the hard plastic case I was happy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Slow measurements no more
customer_reviews.text: While my first meter was slow to measure after working with a customer service rep, Melody who was excellent, I was sent a new meter and I am happy to report that it works much quicker than my old one. Again very good customer service, I had left a negative review and Melody contacted me and offered a replacement or a full refund which I had initially declined because I had used the meter for almost a year. Melody wanted to make things right and again offered to send me a new meter to test out to which I accepted.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lund

customer_reviews.title: Order received when expected. However, I have ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Order received when expected. However, I have ordered quite a few of these over the last 2 years and they don't seem to hold up. I have problems with them just trying to turn them on or giving readings that are way outside the numbers. They don't always calibrate well either. We are trying to be more sensitive to handling and resetting them with distilled water, but just a very sensitive device. When it works, it works well. Company sent out another one free of charge as a result of this experience. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: Calibrated this and it worked awesome. Stored in Storage solution religiously
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on July 3rd, Calibrated this and it worked awesome. Stored in Storage solution religiously... today August 3rd I go to calibrate and its giving me false readings and it reads end during the calibration process.. Broke in 1 month exactly... I do not recommend this product.. Update: I guess they saw my review and sent me a new meter. Very pleased. I will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Martinez jr

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this and was sent a used/returned one. The company made it right and sent me a brand new one. Very accurate and has been very durable as I've used it a dozen or so times now. I'll epate the review if any problems come up.
customer_reviews.author: R'Real Reviews USA

customer_reviews.title: Slow calculation time but easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This pH metter is pretty easy to use. I feel like it needs to be calibrated pretty often though. It also is slow to measure the pH of a fluid. If I go from pH 4.50 to 8.00pH it will jump from 4.50 to 7.46 then slowly climb up to 8.00 after a few minutes. Maybe im using it wrong... but I followed the instructions and they were pretty easy to understand. Only issue would be the slow calculation time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great pH meter for the Home Brewer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this meter for homebrewing applications. I was very impressed with the storage case, supplied three point testing solutions (two sets), and batteries. It is easy to use, has a temperature readout, and ATC. Excellent tool for the homebrewer looking to dial in mash pH.
customer_reviews.author: J_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had this meter for about 5 months before it began giving vastly incorrect measurements. Re-calibration wasn't working so I emailed customer support and they offered to send me a brand new unit. Really helpful to talk to! I think my error may have been how I stored the unit. I was sure to keep the tip and sponge moist, but I was rinsing the probe off with hard water. I plan on buying distilled water to use as a rinse before putting the cap back on. Overall a great product with really accurate readings after you wait for the temperature probe to equalize with the fluid temp.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Helps maintain compliance
customer_reviews.text: Use these in my Wastewater treatment business. Allows for wastewater monitoring from the front to the back of the wastewater stream helping me make adjustments to the treatment system.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: won't stay calibrated
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up last week thinking it would be much more accurate than the $10 meters I have. Tried without calibrating in my tap water which is 7.51 ph according to a professional lab test. This meter consistently reads 8.38 + in the same water even after 2 calibrations. My cheesy meter says 7.24 which I believe is closer to being correct. Looks like I wasted $36...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry it’s not working
customer_reviews.text: Got one that calibrated but everything I check shows a ph of 6.18 . I know my tap water is 8.1 and my ro water is 7.2 , so this one is not working either .
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Meter Came w/4.0 pH Calibration Powder ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for arriving on time. However, since it requires calibration prior to first use, I can't perform that function until my separately ordered calibration powders arrive. Because of the virus hysteria, I won't receive those for two weeks. Back to using the old, old school color-coded liquid pH test kit in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: hugh t.

customer_reviews.title: Great meter especially for the $$
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me start off by saying I've purchased the little cheap ph meters that oddly look the same just under a different name for $15 and you get what you pay for......I love this meter!! Of course you will have to re calibrate from time to time but I live it and the accuracy. If you're wondering if you should buy it let me save you some time.....lay down the 40 bucks and get this meter......although updated mine crapped out on me after 6 months but whatever
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Most consistent readings I've gotten
customer_reviews.text: Used about 6 months for hydroponics. Have tried all the cheap ones and some mid-price models. This one gives consistent readings witjh good accuracy. I re-calibrate every 2 weeks, and see minimal drift between calibrations. Will buy again when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Senior

customer_reviews.title: Apparently new old stock is acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Guess I was expecting something a little newer than 15yrs old. Calibration failed (yes, I read followed the directions) and little sponge in the cap was dry... Gee, great. Now to just make up a 3mol/L solution of KCL to.. reset the sensor. Unsure if this qualifies as broken out of the box, or "lol, some assembly required". I'd like this to be a 1-star... perhaps I cannot change it now?
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Tricked again
customer_reviews.text: First of all I use ph meters alot. This one died after a couple months. Would not calibrate the lower number and would not hold a calibration if its life depended on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry l england

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and calibrate
customer_reviews.text: I had another cheap generic pH meter. It always read high and needed constant calibration. This meter calibrated in a few mins and was spot on accurate as compared to what my pool store read. Saves me weekly trips to get the water professionally tested now.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Friends works great. But mine Does not hold its calibration even for two uses. Very sad about this product has cost me alot of grow ph issues. Use a blue lab I had one work for 12 yrs always accurate. Go with a blue lab pen!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh bonamie

customer_reviews.title: They don't last long +
customer_reviews.text: Updated. Vendor refunded money and replaced device. I can't get over a couple to three months use from one. I use it nearly everyday, keep the tip wet, clean per instructions and eventually they won't calibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Was nice while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a nice PH meter to use. But after ~8 months it won't calibrate. I can purchase a PH meter for half the price of the Dr. Meter PH100-V with that level of reliability.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN D.

customer_reviews.title: seems nice but mine  didnt work
customer_reviews.text: The meter seems well built , display is nice but mine has been jumpy since the beginning. Simple solutions bouncing from 5 to 7 to 3 and so on. Followed the instructions, used all.the right storage solution etc. not sure why but mine didn't work, maybe It got rattled in transit. There seems to be a lot of good reviews , I just didnt get a functional one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It even appears to be water resistant and possibly proof. Easy to read and keep clean. Not top of the line, yet if one did not know that it was not one would assume it is worth more than its cost.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAELCOLEMAN

customer_reviews.title: It arrived used. was not calibrated and would not calibrate
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in parts, wet, and used with broken prongs. When i did get it to come on, it did not calibrate. I worked on it for hours hoping it was just me not being able to figure it out. but when i unscrewed the actual ph sensor the prongs had been smashed down. Like someone took it apart then returned it. It does not do quick reads and would never get to 9.18
customer_reviews.author: mike sullivan

customer_reviews.title: A hot mess
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this works bit easy to use. I in the Caribbean cab not even send it back.
customer_reviews.author: uhngood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this unit, but first one wouldn't hold its calibration, and time limit for return had past. So I contacted the manufacturer about replacement under warranty, and they were awesome about replacing it quite promptly. This unit is working for now and I am satisfied with my purchase, hoping for long term success. I use it to read and adjust Ph levels of plant nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay calibrated and then finally dosen't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy. Looks like a well made ph pen but it dosen't stay calibrated. It only lasted a month and a couple of days past return date so i got screwed. It dosen't work at all any more so go buy a cheap ph pen and dont buy this..
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward electronic PH meter
customer_reviews.text: Appears quite good for the price-point. Tested some liquids with precision test strips and the Dr.meter reads the same, within limits of accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Non reliable, gives different reading of the same solutions Everytime. Update: contacted by customer service, issue was handled appropriately. All is well.
customer_reviews.author: Quisxx

customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good probe at first (6 months) then I got more calibration liquid and noticed it was off by 3 points. The reason I bought this meter was because the electrode was replaceable. I cannot find and others say the same thing if you read through the questions. The meter worked at first but you will have to replace the probe end. This was the 2nd meter in a year, first was a different manufacture. If you are going to use this regularly, then I would recommend popping for a good one or verifying you can get the replacement probes.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: This one didn't really worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to read and the accuracy was not spot on. I ended up using paper, cheaper and almost the same accuracy as this one. I return this product for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Maximo b

customer_reviews.title: Get a few of the cheap ones over this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrid device. Conflicting calibration instructions (deionized water vs distilled). Unitn will not calibrate properly out of the box. Each solution is off by the same amount when trying to calibrate so its definitely a manufacturer defect. Do yourself a favor and save yourself a headache and jus buy 5 of the $10.00 ones. Much safer bet and the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The first one would not calibrate. But was sent a new one within 24 hours. This one is great! Accurate. Very helpful and worth the money. Use in hydroponic pond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Extra set of batteries are also supplied. If it lasts a long time that will be the real test. I use it for brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping.! Arrived in a nice case. I did Calibrate it before my 1st use it's definitely accurate I'd say 0.1% plus or minus well worth the money I'm never buy the cheap yellow one again Thanks Dr.meter. will update after a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: There are Better products out there.
customer_reviews.text: So many more ph readers out there that are just better. My biggest gripe about this one in particular is the ph reading does not stop calculating. When taking a reading for example: 7.4, the reading will jump to a higher number and rapidly drop to the correct reading then slowly drop to 0. It does not stop at a fixed reading
customer_reviews.author: Brian p.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have over 20 years experience with lab equipment. This pH meter works just fine. I compared its readings and the supplied buffer standards to others which are expensive lab grade and the numbers are nearly identical. The only thing that was concerning was it arrived with the electrode cap corroded from a leaking fluid. I assume the fluid was from the buffered sponge that they store in the electrode cap.
customer_reviews.author: alex kish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good meter. Time will tell but I’m happy with it so far. At this point would not hesitate to buy again. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Good meter, marginal instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The pH meter performs as expected. I have had prior experience with similar meters. The instructions however were difficult to understand. The instructions must have been written in Chinese and translated to English. Some of the instructions were difficult to understand as the sentences were not written in "good English".
customer_reviews.author: deerfeeder

customer_reviews.title: Not a good meter
customer_reviews.text: Stopped functioning after a couple months. Recieved no response from seller. The meter was stored properly and calibrated frequently, and then it just stopped taking correct readings.....cold tap water 115 degrees....what? I have had better luck with the $10 meters.
customer_reviews.author: Irie Roots

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The meter isn't as hard to calibrate and operate as it seems to be. Accurate and fast.
customer_reviews.author: BinManea

customer_reviews.title: worked fine for month then cant calibrate
customer_reviews.text: it worked fine for first calibration nut after two months it wont calibrate,followed instructions to a tee,,,but notta.even when i put in 4.0 solution it reads in 6 range.amazon support sucks.sometimes saving online isnt saving...local shop here i come
customer_reviews.author: willy535

customer_reviews.title: This is the meter you want to buy, forget those yellow inaccurate pieces of junk
customer_reviews.text: Once calibrated, this thing is the meter you want! I bought several of the cheap $11 yellow meters, only to have them fail. This is the unit you want to buy!
customer_reviews.author: PRiM3CuSToM3R

product_meta.title: Dr.meter 0.01 Resolution High Accuracy Pocket Size pH Meter with ATC, 0-14pH Measurement Range
feature_bullets: ▶ 【Automatic Calibration】: Often troubled by calibration problem? Just one touch button can help you calibrate the digital pH tester. Featuring a three-point calibration method with simple calibration procedures, the Dr.meter pH testing device can automatically identify the calibration liquid to give you the pH reading almost in a flash.
▶ 【Convenient pH Value Reading】: Get the job done with ease. Ready to read the pH value? Just know the liquid quality with one-button lock reading function. It really is that easy.

▶ 【utomatic Temperature Compensation】: With automatic temperature compensation function (ATC), the Dr.meter pH meter can solve possible inaccuracy caused by the change of liquid temperature, making the pH more accurate.

▶ 【High Accuracy】: Have you ever seen a digital pH meter designed with premium accuracy together with fast response? You can do now with Dr.meter pH tester. Equipped with high-quality and high-accuracy algorithm chip and electrode, the Dr.meter pH tester is the perfect choice for solution quality testing.

▶ 【Wide Application】: We've got covered all pH testing occasion you need! Boosting with pocket size, the Dr.meter pH tester is ideal for daily household, teaching and testing use. It is suitable for testing pH of drinking water, swimming pool, aquarium, spa, hydroponics, food, wine and beer making and more.

specifications.Included Components: - 1 x pH Meter - 1 x Carrying case - 6 x Calibration packet - 1 x User manual - 1 x Warranty card - 4 x button cell - 1 x Warranty card
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars976 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
